root.name: Age of Wonders III
root.description: OverviewAge of Wonders III is a 4X fantasy strategy game and the first installment of the Age of Wonders franchise in a decade. It is created by the series' original developer Triumph Studios. Each kingdom's leader is based on an archetypical fantasy RPG character class, such as Rogue, Warlord, or Sorcerer. The choice of the leader's class and race determines their abilities. Gameplay is divided between a strategic world map and tactical battlefields. The map is hexagon-based and resembles the visual presentation of Civilization V. Its release is expected sometime in Autumn 2013.
